definitions.definition: Any of a series of univalent radicals of the general formula C n H 2n+1 derived from aliphatic hydrocarbons . In other words, an alkane minus one hydrogen atom.

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) Any of a series of univalent radicals of the general formula C n H 2n+1 derived from aliphatic hydrocarbons . In other words, an alkane minus one hydrogen atom.
